ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: ... no ... 4 ... the ... let ... or ... and ... The one other place that s good to get small bronze armor is the gobbo warriors and better in Highpass Keep.
ygData.messageBody:
> My current primary character (26th level Druid) is going to twink Lasombra
> with what I can find. Since I had (until you were kind enough to help me)
no
> clue where to find small bronze armor, I continued to narrow the location
> from "Unrest" to a smaller area. Like "the main floor back door entry has
4
> mobs that should have it". Since it appears that Drybone skeletons are
the
> primary MoBs that have Small Bronze, I will be checking out 3 places as my
> Druid; Lake Rathetear, Befallen and Unrest. If this assumption is wrong,
let
> me know.
>
> I don't want to waste time wandering Norrath auctioning for small bronze,
or
> attacking the wrong MoBs looking for it, as I want Lasombra to become my
> Primary character as fast as I can. Now I have specific locations to go
and
> auction and/or hunt for it. That was my goal, it has been achieved. Thank
> you for your patience.

The one other place that's good to get small bronze armor is the gobbo
warriors and better in Highpass Keep. At 26th level, that's a good prime
hunting ground for you right now, so go and hang out there for a bit. You
might have to wait for a few to get into a group, but the end results are
very worthwhile.

Jezebele
Human SK of the 16th Sacrifice
